message: Using the '.*' form of import should be avoided - lombok.*.
Wrong lexicographical order for 'java.time.LocalDateTime' import. Should be before 'org.springframework.web.servlet.function.ServerResponse'.
Import statement for 'org.springframework.web.servlet.function.RouterFunctions.route' is in the wrong order. Should be in the 'STATIC' group, expecting not assigned imports on this line.
Import statement for 'org.springframework.web.servlet.function.ServerResponse.accepted' is in the wrong order. Should be in the 'STATIC' group, expecting not assigned imports on this line.
'lambda arguments' has incorrect indentation level 24, expected level should be one of the following: 16, 20.
'block' child has incorrect indentation level 28, expected level should be one of the following: 20, 24.
'block' child has incorrect indentation level 28, expected level should be one of the following: 20, 24.
'block rcurly' has incorrect indentation level 24, expected level should be one of the following: 16, 20.
Top-level class SimpleHandler has to reside in its own source file.
Top-level class HelloHandler has to reside in its own source file.
Top-level class LoggerHandler has to reside in its own source file.
Top-level class GreetingRequest has to reside in its own source file.
Top-level class GreetingResult has to reside in its own source file.
